title: Teacher Training Program Based on Serious Games for Collaborative Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Familiarity with basic cooperative learning theories and digital tool application experience
context.additional_context: Facilitation of collaborative problem-solving activities using digital/hybrid serious games in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments.

learning_goals: Learners can design collaborative learning activities using four core elements: task, time, technology, and team composition
Learners can evaluate the consistency and effectiveness of learning designs based on game feedback
Learners can interact with team members in digital/hybrid environments to complete optimal collaborative learning scenarios
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
